text: Hsu Shui-teh (; 1 August 1931 - 31 March 2021) was a Taiwanese politician. He was the President of the Examination Yuan from 1996 to 2002. Hsu died of pneumonia on 31 March 2021, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Mayors of Taipei
title: Hsu Shui-teh
